episodes.title: Mark Vicente Talks Narcissism and Escaping the NXIVM Cult
episodes.description:
Mark Vicente is a South African-born filmmaker, author, and speaker, best known as the director and cinematographer for the acclaimed documentary "What the Bleep Do We Know?!" 

He is also known for his involvement with and subsequent whistleblowing against the NXIVM organization, where he became a key witness in the federal trial against its leadership, documented in the acclaimed HBO series "The Vow."

Vicente next film is "The Narcissist's Playbook," currently in post-production. 

https://www.markvicente.com/

Dave's website: davidsutcliffe.com

00:00 Intro
00:05:00 A Kundalini awakening
00:13:15 Talk therapy vs. Somatic therapy
00:19:25 What drew Mark to cults
00:26:34 Neurotic impulses vs. Soul Urges
00:38:22 Waking up and growing up
00:45:58 Doing whatever it takes
01:01:48 You don't know how strong you are until you're faced with hell
01:08:37 The Age of Sovereignty
01:19:12 Life in Portugal
01:23:06 Projects Mark is working on now
01:28:39 Narcissism is a profound disconnection

#narcissim #psychopathy #NXIVM #Cults
